title: Universal Internet Access
description: In 2023, 100% of both the male and female population in the United Arab Emirates used the Internet, making it one of the few countries with universal internet access.

title: Lowest Adolescent School Dropout Rate
description: In 2023, only 0.0034% of adolescents of lower secondary school age were out of school in the UAE, indicating an almost universal school attendance rate.

title: High International Migrant Population
description: As of 2015, 88.4% of the UAE's population consisted of international migrants, one of the highest percentages globally.

title: Low Female Adult Mortality Rate
description: In 2023, the mortality rate for adult females in the UAE was 18.5 per 1,000 female adults, one of the lowest rates worldwide.
